summary: AI Health Zon: A comprehensive AI-powered healthcare platform website with RCM, Healthcare Technology solutions, and a Healthcare Connecting Platform linking hospitals, medical professionals, vendors, NGOs, and services
architectural_notes: Multi-stakeholder platform requiring role-based authentication and dashboards
Searchable directory with filters (location, category, services)
Form submission system for careers, vendors, ambulance, NGO registration
AI chatbot integration for contact page
Multi-page website with 12 distinct pages plus dashboard variations
Interactive landing page with gamified animation showing stakeholder requests and approvals
Admin approval workflow for stakeholder registrations (careers, vendors, ambulance, NGO)
Status tracking system: Pending → Approved → Rejected
PIN code-based auto-fill for city/state in registration forms using PIN code lookup API or database
known_issues: Chatbot not functioning on the website

existing_features.title: Create a Home page with hero section displaying the master brand line: 'AI Health Zon is an AI-powered healthcare platform delivering Revenue Cycle Management, Healthcare Technology solutions, and a Healthcare Connecting Platform that links hospitals with doctors, nurses, radiologists, physiotherapists, dietitians, ambulance services, diagnostics, pharmacies, vendors, insurance partners, NGOs, and compliance experts on one unified digital platform.' Include two CTA buttons: 'Request Demo' and 'Join Network'.

Add a Three Vertical Overview section on the Home page with cards for: (1) RCM - AI-powered billing, claims, denial management, revenue optimization; (2) Healthcare Technology - AI dashboards, system integration, compliance support; (3) Connecting Platform - Workforce, ambulance, labs, pharmacies, vendors, NGOs.
Create a 'How It Works' section on the Home page showing three steps: Register → Verified → Start using, with visual indicators or icons for each step.
Add quick links section on the Home page with navigation to: Careers, Vendors, Ambulance, and NGO registration pages.
Include a testimonials placeholder section on the Home page with space for future testimonial content.
Add a future vision snippet on the Home page displaying: 'Future-ready AI healthcare ecosystem'.
Create an About Us page with Company Overview section covering mission, vision, and core purpose.
Add 'Why Choose Us' section to the About Us page highlighting benefits for hospitals, professionals, vendors, and NGOs.
Include Three Verticals Overview on the About Us page with bullet points for: RCM, Technology, and Connecting Platform verticals.
Add Compliance & Accreditation section to the About Us page covering NABH, Licensing, and data security.
Include 'Our Impact' section on the About Us page with success stories and placeholders for metrics.

Create a Solutions page with Vertical 1 - Revenue Cycle Management (RCM) section detailing: Eligibility & pre-authorization, Medical billing & coding, Claims management & tracking, Denial prediction & follow-up, AR & revenue dashboards.

Add Vertical 2 - Healthcare Technology section to the Solutions page covering: AI dashboards & analytics, HIS/EHR integration, NABH & Licensing support, Telemedicine & remote monitoring, Data security & compliance.

Add Vertical 3 - Healthcare Connecting Platform section to the Solutions page listing: Workforce (doctors, nurses, radiologists, physiotherapists, dietitians, coders, RCM staff), Emergency & ambulance services, Diagnostics & labs, Pharmacies & medicine suppliers, Vendors & service providers, NGOs & community support, Insurance partners & TPAs.

Create a Healthcare Support System page with sections for: Workforce Support (all clinical & administrative staff), Emergency & Ambulance (services, ICU transport, event support), Diagnostics & Labs (pathology, radiology, imaging, home sample collection), Pharmacy & Medicines (hospital, retail, supply chain), Home Healthcare (home nursing, physiotherapy, elderly care), Mental Health & Wellness (counselors, rehab, psychological support), Vendors & Suppliers (equipment, IT, facility services), NGOs & Community Support (blood banks, NGOs, volunteers), Compliance & Quality Support (NABH, licensing, audit support), Insurance & TPA Coordination, Training & Education, Logistics & Supply Chain.

Create a Network Directory page with searchable directory listings for: Hospitals & Clinics, Workforce (Doctors, Nurses, Radiologists, Physios, Dietitians), Ambulance & Emergency Services, Diagnostics & Labs, Pharmacies, Vendors & Suppliers, Insurance & TPAs, NGOs & Community Organizations, Compliance Experts. Include filters for Location, Category, and Services. Each profile should show Services, Contact information, and Partnership Option.

Create a Careers & Profile Submission page listing job opportunities for: Doctors, Nurses, Radiologists, Physiotherapists, Dietitians, Medical Coders, RCM Staff, Insurance Staff, Security, Housekeeping, Admin. Include an application form with fields: Name, Role, Experience, Location, Phone, Email, Upload CV. Display benefits: Visibility, Hospital connections, Career growth.
Create a Vendors page with vendor registration for: Equipment, IT & Software, Pharmacy, Facility Services. Display benefits: Leads, Hospital tie-ups, Visibility. Include a vendor directory listing.

Create an Ambulance Services page with registration for ambulance services covering: Emergency, ICU, Event support. Display benefits: Faster response, Hospital requests, Network listing. Implement location-based search functionality.

Create an NGO Listing page with NGO directory for: Health NGOs, Blood banks, Relief organizations. Include filters for Location, Focus Area, and Services. Add NGO registration form with fields: Name, Registration No, Focus Area, Services, Contact. Display programs section covering: Blood drives, Camps, Awareness, Disaster support.

Create a Dashboard page with role-based sections for logged-in users: Hospitals (Revenue dashboard, Claim status, Staff requests, Vendor management, Compliance tracking), Professionals (Profile, Job leads, Assignments), Vendors (Leads, Orders, Payments), NGOs (Programs, Volunteer coordination).
Create a Contact page with sections for: Address, Email, Phone, WhatsApp Button, AI Chatbot, and Inquiry Form.
Create three legal pages: Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, and Refund Policy. Each page should be accessible from the footer.

Implement a main navigation system that provides access to all pages: Home, About Us, Solutions, Healthcare Support System, Network Directory, Careers, Vendors, Ambulance Services, NGO Listing, Dashboard (when logged in), and Contact. Include footer navigation to legal pages.

Design a cohesive visual theme for the AI Health Zon platform that conveys professionalism, trust, and innovation in healthcare technology. Use a modern, clean design with healthcare-appropriate colors (avoid blue & purple), clear typography, and consistent spacing. Apply this theme uniformly across all pages with appropriate use of whitespace, card layouts for content sections, and clear visual hierarchy.
Update the phone number displayed on the Contact page to +91-8696766966
Implement a functional AI chatbot widget on the Contact page that allows users to interact with an assistant for inquiries and support
Update the entire platform color theme to use Royal Teal as the primary accent color and Royal White as the background/neutral color throughout all pages

Create a new interactive onboarding/landing page that displays before the main home page, featuring a game-like animation sequence where different stakeholders (hospitals, doctors, nurses, vendors, ambulance services, NGOs, pharmacies, labs) send join requests to AI Health Zon, the platform receives and approves these requests with visual feedback, and stakeholders display happy/peaceful reactions upon approval
Update the application routing to make the new onboarding page the initial landing page, with automatic or user-triggered progression to the existing home page
Create an Admin Dashboard page route at '/admin' that displays a comprehensive approval management interface for all stakeholder registration requests

Implement a Pending Requests section in the Admin Dashboard that displays all pending registrations organized by stakeholder type: Healthcare Professionals (doctors, nurses, radiologists, physiotherapists, dietitians), Vendors, Ambulance Services, and NGOs

Display detailed information for each pending request including full name, role/category, contact information (phone, email), experience/services, location, uploaded documents (CV for professionals), and submission timestamp
Add Approve and Reject action buttons for each pending request in the Admin Dashboard with visual confirmation when actions are taken
Add status filter tabs in the Admin Dashboard to view requests by status: All, Pending, Approved, and Rejected
Update existing registration forms (Careers, Vendors, Ambulance Services, NGO Listing pages) to submit requests with Pending status instead of directly creating active profiles
Add a notification badge or counter in the Admin Dashboard navigation link showing the total number of pending requests awaiting approval
Include contact action buttons in each request detail view that allow opening WhatsApp chat or initiating email with the stakeholder using their submitted contact information
Add a PIN code input field to the Careers registration form (frontend/src/pages/Careers.tsx) that accepts manual entry of 6-digit postal codes
Add a PIN code input field to the Vendors registration form (frontend/src/pages/Vendors.tsx) that accepts manual entry of 6-digit postal codes
Add a PIN code input field to the Ambulance Services registration form (frontend/src/pages/AmbulanceServices.tsx) that accepts manual entry of 6-digit postal codes
Add a PIN code input field to the NGO Listing registration form (frontend/src/pages/NgoListing.tsx) that accepts manual entry of 6-digit postal codes
Implement auto-fill functionality that automatically populates the city and state fields when a valid PIN code is entered in the Careers registration form
Implement auto-fill functionality that automatically populates the city and state fields when a valid PIN code is entered in the Vendors registration form
Implement auto-fill functionality that automatically populates the city and state fields when a valid PIN code is entered in the Ambulance Services registration form
Implement auto-fill functionality that automatically populates the city and state fields when a valid PIN code is entered in the NGO Listing registration form
Create a PIN code lookup utility or API integration that maps Indian postal codes to their corresponding city and state information for the auto-fill functionality
Create a NetworkMap page component at frontend/src/pages/NetworkMap.tsx that displays an interactive world map visualization showing the geographical distribution of approved stakeholders
Implement real-time map updates using React Query that automatically refreshes the map visualization when new stakeholders are approved by admin
Add a 'Network Map' navigation link in the main Navigation component that routes to the new NetworkMap page
Add a route definition for '/network-map' in frontend/src/App.tsx that renders the NetworkMap page component
Invalidate the network map query cache in the admin approval mutations so the map auto-updates when stakeholders are approved or rejected
Update the hero section image and visual design on the Home page (frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx) to match the style and layout shown on www.ttphealth.in

Create 3 white-themed hero images for the home page hero section animation sequence, similar to the rotating images on ttphealth.in. Each image should feature healthcare/medical themes suitable for display in a hero section carousel.

Implement an auto-rotating image carousel in the home page hero section (frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx) that cycles through the 3 generated hero images with smooth fade or slide transitions, matching the animation style from ttphealth.in.

Ensure text content (heading, subheading, CTA buttons) remains visible over the animating hero images in frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx. Text should be rendered in teal color with sufficient contrast against the white hero images.
Update the global color scheme in frontend/index.css and frontend/tailwind.config.js to use white as the primary background color and teal as the primary accent/text color throughout the entire site.
Update the Navigation component (frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx) to use orange as the background color for the header/navigation bar.

Update the global color scheme in frontend/index.css to match the McKinsey healthcare page color palette from https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare/how-we-help-clients/americas/business-building, replacing the current orange and teal colors with McKinsey's professional color scheme

Update frontend/tailwind.config.js to configure Tailwind CSS with the McKinsey-inspired color palette, ensuring all color tokens align with the professional healthcare business aesthetic from the reference page

Update typography settings across the site in frontend/index.css and frontend/tailwind.config.js to match McKinsey's font family, font weights, line heights, and text sizing hierarchy from https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare/how-we-help-clients/americas/business-building

Update the Navigation component (frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx) to match McKinsey's navigation bar style from https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare/how-we-help-clients/americas/business-building, including background color, text colors, spacing, and hover states

Update the Home page (frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx) hero section styling to match McKinsey's hero design from https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare/how-we-help-clients/americas/business-building, including layout, spacing, text styling, and button design

Update button styling throughout the application to match McKinsey's button design from https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare/how-we-help-clients/americas/business-building, including primary, secondary, and outline button variants with appropriate colors, borders, and hover states

Update section spacing, padding, and layout grid system across all pages to match McKinsey's generous whitespace and content organization from https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare/how-we-help-clients/americas/business-building

Update the Footer component (frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx) styling to match McKinsey's footer design from https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare/how-we-help-clients/americas/business-building, including background color, text colors, link styling, and layout structure

Update the Network Directory page (frontend/src/pages/NetworkDirectory.tsx) layout to match McKinsey's Our People page card-based profile design from https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare/our-people, with profile cards displaying in a responsive grid layout

Update Network Directory card styling to match McKinsey's profile card design from https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare/our-people, including card borders, shadows, hover effects, image treatment, and typography hierarchy

Implement an enhanced filtering system in the Network Directory matching McKinsey's Our People page functionality from https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare/our-people, with filters for stakeholder category, location, specialty/service area, and clear filter controls

Add professional profile detail views in the Network Directory that expand or navigate to show comprehensive stakeholder information including bio, services, experience, and contact options, matching the interaction pattern from https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare/our-people

Update Network Directory page spacing, padding, and overall layout structure to match McKinsey's generous whitespace and content organization from https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare/our-people

new_feature_requests.summary: Home page with hero section, three verticals overview, how it works, testimonials
About Us page with company overview, why choose us, verticals, compliance, impact
Solutions page detailing RCM, Healthcare Technology, and Connecting Platform verticals
Healthcare Support System page covering workforce, emergency, diagnostics, pharmacy, vendors, NGOs, compliance
Network Directory page with searchable listings and filters for all stakeholders
Careers & Profile Submission page with job opportunities and application form
Vendors page with registration, benefits, and directory
Ambulance Services page with registration and location-based search
NGO Listing page with directory, filters, registration, and programs
Dashboard page with role-based views for hospitals, professionals, vendors, NGOs
Contact page with address, WhatsApp, AI chatbot, inquiry form
Legal pages: Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, Refund Policy
Interactive opening/landing page with gamified stakeholder onboarding animation showing requests being received and approved
Admin Dashboard with pending requests section, approval workflow, and status tracking for all stakeholder registrations

Add backend data structures and storage for tracking registration requests with status field supporting Pending, Approved, and Rejected states for healthcare professionals, vendors, ambulance services, and NGO submissions
Implement backend approval workflow that creates active stakeholder profiles (healthcare professional, vendor, ambulance service, or NGO) in the main data stores when a request is approved
Add PIN code field to all registration forms (careers, vendors, ambulance, NGO)
Implement auto-fill functionality that populates city and state fields when PIN code is entered in registration forms
Add a world map visualization that auto-updates when stakeholders join the network (after admin approval)
Add a backend method to retrieve all approved stakeholder locations (city, state, PIN code) aggregated from healthcare professionals, vendors, ambulance services, and NGOs with 'Approved' status
Update home page hero image/design to match style from www.ttphealth.in
Add 3 animating images in hero section of home page with text overlay, similar to ttphealth.in animation
Update entire site color scheme to white background with teal text/accents, and orange header color
Update font color throughout the site to orange
Update the global color scheme in frontend/index.css to change all primary text colors from teal to orange throughout the entire site
Update frontend/tailwind.config.js to set orange as the default text color in the Tailwind configuration
Update all page components (Home, About, Solutions, Dashboard, Contact, etc.) to ensure text elements render in orange color, replacing any existing teal text colors
Update the Navigation component (frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx) to use orange text color for navigation links and menu items
Update the Footer component (frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx) to use orange text color for all footer text, links, and headings

Update the entire site theme and color scheme to match the professional style from McKinsey's business-building healthcare page (https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare/how-we-help-clients/americas/business-building), including color palette, typography, spacing, and visual design patterns

Update card component styling across all pages to match McKinsey's card design patterns from https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare/how-we-help-clients/americas/business-building, including borders, shadows, padding, and hover effects

Upgrade Network Directory page to match the profile directory layout and design from McKinsey's Our People page (https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare/our-people), including card-based profile layouts, filtering system, and visual presentation
